question:
You recently went to a concert and thought one of the singers was very good 
You want to tell him how you feel. 
Write a letter to the singer. In your letter 
say how you feel about his petformance 
give details of your musical activities 
explain how you would like him to help you with your musical activities
text: I am writing this letter, to appreciate your singing performance which you gave in A R Rahman's live concert.

First I was really shocked when I saw the performer list , and Your name "Krishan Kumar" was there . I am a big fan of your singing and follow you on every social media platform. At the time of your performance , I was really mesmerised by your singing , notes in every song were perfect and up to the point . It was a pleasure to see performing you live. I never heard you singing old classical songs but in , the concert you sang a few of them too. And I became die heart fan of you.

So I would like to request you if you can be my mentor as I am also good at singing and taking a few singing classes . With your mentorship , I can be more confident in singing and  a stage performance. I know that you are not from a family who has any musical background , so same as me but seeing you I feel motivated .

error_list.error_des: The indefinite article, a, may be redundant when used with the uncountable noun performance in your sentence. Consider removing it.
